benchmark_details.name: SUKHSANDESH (Sukh Sandesh)
benchmark_details.overview: SUKHSANDESH is a multi-staged AI-based Question Answering platform designed to provide sexual education for the rural Indian population, ensuring safety and support for regional languages.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a safe and secure platform for sexual education to vulnerable sections of rural India.

data.source: KAB (Kahee Ankahee Baatein) dataset by Gram Vaani.
data.annotation: Manually annotated by experts and community contributors.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using standard ML evaluation procedures.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in metrics indicate better performance in generating accurate and relevant answers.
methodology.validation: Through user feedback and performance metrics evaluation.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis based on rural demographics and language accessibility needs.
targeted_risks.harm: Potential misinformation or harm from hallucination in generated responses.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User queries will be anonymized to maintain confidentiality.
